subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki swished a 3-pointer with 0.9 seconds left, breaking a tie and giving the Dallas Mavericks a 97-94 victory against the visiting Utah Jazz on Thursday night. Dallas clinched a playoff berth.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki swished a 3-pointer with 0.9 seconds left, breaking a tie and giving the Dallas Mavericks a 97-94 victory against the visiting Utah Jazz on Thursday night. Dallas clinched a playoff berth.
